tspan.tspan: Notice of Personal Information Collection and Use by BIONE
In order to provide customers with the most comprehensive information on consumption, services,
and scientific knowledge, our company collects, processes, utilizes, or transfers personal information
of customers directly or indirectly based on the following reasons and purposes.
principle of service first and the original intention of honesty and trustworthiness.
you in accordance with the provisions of the Personal Data Protection

2. 069 Contract, contract-like or other legal relation matters
5. 148 Internet shopping and other electronic commerce services
Pursuant to the "Specific Purposes and Categories of Personal data under the Personal Data

Therapeutics Corp are as follows (subject to the actual personal information
collected by our company in relation to the relevant services provided to customers)
For example: Name, title, address, o
fice address, previous address, home telephone numbe

account, the number of credit card
card, the number of insurance policy and any other number or account of individual, etc.

Period, recipients, Regions, and methods of use
The period of use of the above-mentioned personal data of customers shall be based on the specific
purpose of collection, or according to relevant laws and regulations (For example: Regulations for
Administration on Human Organ Bank, etc.), or the necessary retention period for business operation,
or the storage period established by individual contracts regarding data.
Group, recipients of international transfer of personal data not
restricted by the competent authority for central purposes, companies that jointly market or use
, other organizations that have business dealings with our compan
and investigative authorities with legal investigation rights.
The locations of the above-mentioned recipients of use, both domestic and international.
Personal data shall be directly or indirectly collected, processed, used, and/or internationally
transferred in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, through automated machines or other
line with current scientific and technological standards).
In accordance with the Personal Data Protection
Act, customers be able to exercise the following
rights with regard to his/her personal data and such rights
1. the right to make an inquiry of and to review his/her personal data;
2. the right to request a copy of his/her personal data;
3. the right to supplement or correct his/her personal data;
4. the right to demand the cessation of the collection, processing or use of his/her personal data; and
5. the right to erase his/her personal data.
Except as otherwise required by law or necessary for the performance of our duties and business,
customers may at any time call our customer service 0800-800-018 to apply to exercise the
Customers have the freedom to decide whether or not to disclose their personal information.
Therapeutics Corp retains the right to exercise its discretion in determining
whether to process any business or services related to the customer and BIONE
Corp if the customer declines to provide their personal information.
If any revisions are made to this notice, BIONE
Therapeutics Corp reserves the right to inform
customers of any significant changes and the designated webpage through verbal communication,
written notice, phone, text message, email, fax, electronic document, or any other means of
fectively inform or make the information available to customers (including
providing customers with a webpage link that contains the details of this notice). Customers are
strongly advised to carefully review the contents of the designated webpage.
